product_name: Moving Comfort Sprint Half-Zip Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Sprint Half-Zip top from Moving Comfort provides soft, performance fabric with ruched seams in just the right places for a flattering look while you enjoy your daily run. Polyester and spandex fabric maximizes comfort while wicking moisture and drying quickly. 11 in. front zipper offers instant ventilation. Rear storage pocket stashes essentials. Thumbholes warm wrists and keep sleeves in place when arms are in motion. You'll feel free to move without restriction thanks to the set-in sleeves. The semifitted Sprint half-zip top from Moving Comfort moves with you during exercise without binding. 26.5 in. back length. Closeout.
short_description: The Sprint Half-Zip top from Moving Comfort provides soft, performance fabric with ruched seams in just the right places for a flattering look while you enjoy your daily run.
